description: Create a user, the user is created without role and group.

name.description: User name, it identifies to the user and it used to access through the WebGUI.

service.description: It is the service which valide the user. The options are: local, is the defult value and the user is created and managed in the load balancer; ldap, the user is validated using the rbac ldap configuration.

password.description: It is the password used by the user to access through the WebGUI.
password.format_msg: must contain at least a letter and a number and a minimum length of 8 characters.
password.depend_on_msg: this parameter is required when authentication method is local.
